verses.text_plain: Amaziah was twenty and five years old when he began to reign, and he reigned twenty and nine years in Jerusalem. And his mother’s name was Jehoaddan of Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 1Amaziah was twenty and five years old when he began to reign, and he reigned twenty and nine years in Jerusalem. And his mother’s name was Jehoaddan of Jerusalem.

verses.text_plain: And he did that which was right in the sight of the Lord, but not with a perfect heart.
verses.verse_html: 2And he did that which was right in the sight of the Lord, but not with a perfect heart.

verses.text_plain: Now it came to pass, when the kingdom was established to him, that he slew his servants that had killed the king his father.
verses.verse_html:
3Now it came to pass, when the kingdom was established to him, that he slew his servants that had killed the king his father. ▼
▼ established…: Heb. confirmed upon him

tokens.text: Now it came to pass, when the kingdom

footnotes.body_html: ▼ established…: Heb. confirmed upon him

verses.text_plain: But he slew not their children, but did as it is written in the law in the book of Moses, where the Lord commanded, saying, The fathers shall not die for the children, neither shall the children die for the fathers, but every man shall die for his own sin.
verses.verse_html: 4But he slew not their children, but did as it is written in the law in the book of Moses, where the Lord commanded, saying, The fathers shall not die for the children, neither shall the children die for the fathers, but every man shall die for his own sin.

verses.text_plain: Moreover Amaziah gathered Judah together, and made them captains over thousands, and captains over hundreds, according to the houses of their fathers, throughout all Judah and Benjamin: and he numbered them from twenty years old and above, and found them three hundred thousand choice men, able to go forth to war, that could handle spear and shield.
verses.verse_html: 5Moreover Amaziah gathered Judah together, and made them captains over thousands, and captains over hundreds, according to the houses of their fathers, throughout all Judah and Benjamin: and he numbered them from twenty years old and above, and found them three hundred thousand choice men, able to go forth to war, that could handle spear and shield.

verses.text_plain: He hired also an hundred thousand mighty men of valour out of Israel for an hundred talents of silver.
verses.verse_html: 6He hired also an hundred thousand mighty men of valour out of Israel for an hundred talents of silver.

verses.text_plain: But there came a man of God to him, saying, O king, let not the army of Israel go with thee; for the Lord is not with Israel, to wit, with all the children of Ephraim.
verses.verse_html: 7But there came a man of God to him, saying, O king, let not the army of Israel go with thee; for the Lord is not with Israel, to wit, with all the children of Ephraim.

verses.text_plain: But if thou wilt go, do it, be strong for the battle: God shall make thee fall before the enemy: for God hath power to help, and to cast down.
verses.verse_html: 8But if thou wilt go, do it, be strong for the battle: God shall make thee fall before the enemy: for God hath power to help, and to cast down.

verses.text_plain: And Amaziah said to the man of God, But what shall we do for the hundred talents which I have given to the army of Israel? And the man of God answered, The Lord is able to give thee much more than this.
verses.verse_html:
9And Amaziah said to the man of God, But what shall we do for the hundred talents which I have given to the army of Israel? And the man of God answered, The Lord is able to give thee much more than this. ▼
▼ army: Heb. band

verses.text_plain: Then Amaziah separated them, to wit, the army that was come to him out of Ephraim, to go home again: wherefore their anger was greatly kindled against Judah, and they returned home in great anger.
verses.verse_html:
10Then Amaziah separated them, to wit, the army that was come to him out of Ephraim, to go home again: wherefore their anger was greatly kindled against Judah, and they returned home in great anger. ▼
▼ home again: Heb. to their place
 , ▼
▼ in great…: Heb. in heat of anger

footnotes.body_text: ▼ home again: Heb. to their place
footnotes.body_html: ▼ home again: Heb. to their place

footnotes.body_text: ▼ in great…: Heb. in heat of anger
footnotes.body_html: ▼ in great…: Heb. in heat of anger

verses.text_plain: And Amaziah strengthened himself, and led forth his people, and went to the valley of salt, and smote of the children of Seir ten thousand.
verses.verse_html: 11And Amaziah strengthened himself, and led forth his people, and went to the valley of salt, and smote of the children of Seir ten thousand.

verses.text_plain: And other ten thousand left alive did the children of Judah carry away captive, and brought them unto the top of the rock, and cast them down from the top of the rock, that they all were broken in pieces.
verses.verse_html: 12And other ten thousand left alive did the children of Judah carry away captive, and brought them unto the top of the rock, and cast them down from the top of the rock, that they all were broken in pieces.

tokens.text: that they all were broken in pieces

verses.text_plain: But the soldiers of the army which Amaziah sent back, that they should not go with him to battle, fell upon the cities of Judah, from Samaria even unto Beth–horon, and smote three thousand of them, and took much spoil.
verses.verse_html:
13But the soldiers of the army which Amaziah sent back, that they should not go with him to battle, fell upon the cities of Judah, from Samaria even unto Beth–horon, and smote three thousand of them, and took much spoil. ▼
▼ the soldiers…: Heb. the sons of the band

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the soldiers…: Heb. the sons of the band
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the soldiers…: Heb. the sons of the band

verses.text_plain: Now it came to pass, after that Amaziah was come from the slaughter of the Edomites, that he brought the gods of the children of Seir, and set them up to be his gods, and bowed down himself before them, and burned incense unto them.
verses.verse_html: 14Now it came to pass, after that Amaziah was come from the slaughter of the Edomites, that he brought the gods of the children of Seir, and set them up to be his gods, and bowed down himself before them, and burned incense unto them.

tokens.text: Now it came to pass, after

verses.text_plain: Wherefore the anger of the Lord was kindled against Amaziah, and he sent unto him a prophet, which said unto him, Why hast thou sought after the gods of the people, which could not deliver their own people out of thine hand?
verses.verse_html: 15Wherefore the anger of the Lord was kindled against Amaziah, and he sent unto him a prophet, which said unto him, Why hast thou sought after the gods of the people, which could not deliver their own people out of thine hand?

tokens.text: unto him, Why hast thou sought

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass, as he talked with him, that the king said unto him, Art thou made of the king’s counsel? forbear; why shouldest thou be smitten? Then the prophet forbare, and said, I know that God hath determined to destroy thee, because thou hast done this, and hast not hearkened unto my counsel.
verses.verse_html:
16And it came to pass, as he talked with him, that the king said unto him, Art thou made of the king’s counsel? forbear; why shouldest thou be smitten? Then the prophet forbare, and said, I know that God hath determined to destroy thee, because thou hast done this, and hast not hearkened unto my counsel. ▼
▼ determined: Heb. counselled

tokens.text: And it came to pass, as he talked

verses.text_plain: Then Amaziah king of Judah took advice, and sent to Joash, the son of Jehoahaz, the son of Jehu, king of Israel, saying, Come, let us see one another in the face.
verses.verse_html: 17Then Amaziah king of Judah took advice, and sent to Joash, the son of Jehoahaz, the son of Jehu, king of Israel, saying, Come, let us see one another in the face.

verses.text_plain: And Joash king of Israel sent to Amaziah king of Judah, saying, The thistle that was in Lebanon sent to the cedar that was in Lebanon, saying, Give thy daughter to my son to wife: and there passed by a wild beast that was in Lebanon, and trode down the thistle.
verses.verse_html:
18And Joash king of Israel sent to Amaziah king of Judah, saying, The thistle that was in Lebanon sent to the cedar that was in Lebanon, saying, Give thy daughter to my son to wife: and there passed by a wild beast that was in Lebanon, and trode down the thistle. ▼
▼ thistle: or, furze bush, or, thorn
 , ▼
▼ a wild…: Heb. a beast of the field

footnotes.body_text: ▼ thistle: or, furze bush, or, thorn
footnotes.body_html: ▼ thistle: or, furze bush, or, thorn

footnotes.body_text: ▼ a wild…: Heb. a beast of the field
footnotes.body_html: ▼ a wild…: Heb. a beast of the field

verses.text_plain: Thou sayest, Lo, thou hast smitten the Edomites; and thine heart lifteth thee up to boast: abide now at home; why shouldest thou meddle to thine hurt, that thou shouldest fall, even thou, and Judah with thee?
verses.verse_html: 19Thou sayest, Lo, thou hast smitten the Edomites; and thine heart lifteth thee up to boast: abide now at home; why shouldest thou meddle to thine hurt, that thou shouldest fall, even thou, and Judah with thee?

verses.text_plain: But Amaziah would not hear; for it came of God, that he might deliver them into the hand of their enemies, because they sought after the gods of Edom.
verses.verse_html: 20But Amaziah would not hear; for it came of God, that he might deliver them into the hand of their enemies, because they sought after the gods of Edom.

verses.text_plain: So Joash the king of Israel went up; and they saw one another in the face, both he and Amaziah king of Judah, at Beth–shemesh, which belongeth to Judah.
verses.verse_html: 21So Joash the king of Israel went up; and they saw one another in the face, both he and Amaziah king of Judah, at Beth–shemesh, which belongeth to Judah.

verses.text_plain: And Judah was put to the worse before Israel, and they fled every man to his tent.
verses.verse_html:
22And Judah was put to the worse before Israel, and they fled every man to his tent. ▼
▼ put…: Heb. smitten

verses.text_plain: And Joash the king of Israel took Amaziah king of Judah, the son of Joash, the son of Jehoahaz, at Beth–shemesh, and brought him to Jerusalem, and brake down the wall of Jerusalem from the gate of Ephraim to the corner gate, four hundred cubits.
verses.verse_html:
23And Joash the king of Israel took Amaziah king of Judah, the son of Joash, the son of Jehoahaz, at Beth–shemesh, and brought him to Jerusalem, and brake down the wall of Jerusalem from the gate of Ephraim to the corner gate, four hundred cubits. ▼
▼ the corner…: Heb. the gate of it that looketh

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the corner…: Heb. the gate of it that looketh
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the corner…: Heb. the gate of it that looketh

verses.text_plain: And he took all the gold and the silver, and all the vessels that were found in the house of God with Obed–edom, and the treasures of the king’s house, the hostages also, and returned to Samaria.
verses.verse_html: 24And he took all the gold and the silver, and all the vessels that were found in the house of God with Obed–edom, and the treasures of the king’s house, the hostages also, and returned to Samaria.

verses.text_plain: And Amaziah the son of Joash king of Judah lived after the death of Joash son of Jehoahaz king of Israel fifteen years.
verses.verse_html: 25And Amaziah the son of Joash king of Judah lived after the death of Joash son of Jehoahaz king of Israel fifteen years.

verses.text_plain: Now the rest of the acts of Amaziah, first and last, behold, are they not written in the book of the kings of Judah and Israel?
verses.verse_html: 26Now the rest of the acts of Amaziah, first and last, behold, are they not written in the book of the kings of Judah and Israel?

verses.text_plain: Now after the time that Amaziah did turn away from following the Lord they made a conspiracy against him in Jerusalem; and he fled to Lachish: but they sent to Lachish after him, and slew him there.
verses.verse_html:
27Now after the time that Amaziah did turn away from following the Lord they made a conspiracy against him in Jerusalem; and he fled to Lachish: but they sent to Lachish after him, and slew him there. ▼
▼ from…: Heb. from after
 , ▼
▼ made…: Heb. conspired a conspiracy

footnotes.body_html: ▼ from…: Heb. from after
▼ made…: Heb. conspired a conspiracy

verses.text_plain: And they brought him upon horses, and buried him with his fathers in the city of Judah.
verses.verse_html:
28And they brought him upon horses, and buried him with his fathers in the city of Judah. ▼
▼ Judah: that is, the city of David

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Judah: that is, the city of David
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Judah: that is, the city of David
